title: Online Expert Course for Problem-Centered STEM Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental theories and research methodologies in STEM fields, with graduate-level academic background
context.additional_context: A course strengthening STEM instructional design competencies via problem-based learning in large-scale online settings. Learners collaborate asynchronously through an LMS, with digital tools as the core of learning activities.

learning_goals: Learners can design STEM-integrated tasks by applying Problem-Based Learning (PBL) methodologies.
Learners can build context-based STEM learning environments using mobile/ubiquitous technologies.
Learners can measure STEM project-based learning outcomes using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
